body:
Comment 2: 
The nickname is only unique at a certain point in time. One person can stop using a
nickname and another can start. This has happened too. For that matter the same is true
(though less common) for full email addresses.

The R= line is just a hint. It's also nearly useless because replying to a thread makes
you a "Reviewer" to Rietveld.
 
A better fix for this would be for the codereview plugin to fetch the set of LGTMs, now
that that's available from the codereview API, and show the full email addresses there.
